events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their vehicle and another car in a parking lot, requesting to file an insurance claim promptly.
Claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after review of initial claim details regarding car collision.
An agent specialized in vehicle accident claims was assigned to handle the customer's case and assist with the entire process.
Customer received formal acknowledgment of claim submission, with confirmation that the investigation process will begin soon.
Request sent to the customer for additional documents including photos of the vehicle damage, police report, and repair estimates.
Customer submitted all required documents including photos of damages, the official police report, and a mechanicâ€™s damage estimate.
The claim investigation has started to verify the facts, evaluate the damage, and validate the liability regarding the vehicle collision.
Investigation completed successfully confirming the customer's claim details and verifying the extent of damages to the vehicle.
An initial settlement proposal was sent to the customer covering vehicle repair costs and related expenses after claim validation.
Customer responded positively to the settlement proposal expressing satisfaction with the amount and timely handling of the claim.
Claim was officially approved by the insurance company after all documents and investigation results met the requirements.
Payment for the approved claim amount was issued to the customer's bank account to cover the vehicle repair costs as agreed.
The claim process is now officially closed following successful payment and confirmation from the customer regarding claim satisfaction.
